name: Crime Scene Investigation: 2
description:
A man is found beaten and stabbed in his house.

The Cause of the death is unknown and the suspect is none.

Our investigation team needs your help.

Put on your detective cap to help the team.

Use your intelligence to solve the murder and find the criminal.

Investigate and find the evidences to corner the murderers.

Your task is to collect all the items found in the screen and correlates them logically or illogically.

The rules are simple. Saviors just tap on the item; it will be added to the inventory panel.

Have a great escape!


FEATURES:
Creative concept
Easy Puzzles
Attractive Background
Turn on/off sound
Supports both Phone/Tab
No limited timing
Be careful, it is very addictive!!
